name: Deluxe Room
description: Expect straightforward elegance and restful comfort in our 30-35 sqm deluxe bedrooms. You have the option of booking a king-sized bed or two single beds, whichever suits your needs.

content: Each room offers 42 sqm / 452 sqf of luxury.
Memorable views of the lake and city.
Large, modern bathroom with walk-in shower and separate bathtub.
Wide selection of international and local television channels

name: Executive Garden Room
description: The Executive Garden Room is a 40-48 sqm room that comes with a relaxing pocket garden. This room is perfect for guests who prefer to take the party upstairs after hours.

content: Each room offers 42 sqm / 452 sqf of luxury.
Memorable views of the lake and city.
Large, modern bathroom with walk-in shower and separate bathtub.
Wide selection of international and local television channels

name: Executive Varenda Room
description: The Executive Veranda Room features a panoramic view of General Santos City. The 40-48-sqm room comes with balcony area that is perfect for morning coffee.

name: One Bedroom Suite
description: This 63-sqm suite is a definite treat for larger groups and families. It comes with a comfortable common living room area and a bathtub.
